nodes.text: The KL-9Z-SE was a model of landspeeder produced by Korrealis Systems during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The KL-9Z-SE is a Imperial-only mount in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic that was added in Game Update 2.7, where it is a rare item dropped by bosses of the Assault on Tython flashpoint.
